title: （國際線）立場專題嘅英文版已經上線喇

replies.msg:
立場從上年開始一直有將佢地專題報道譯做英文，不過好似無咩人知
有喲好深入嘅報道幾值得spread出去俾世界知
例如佢最近譯左篇講六四，入面有喲野都幾好
例如有一段講香港人嘅勇氣 ，我覺得幾好

Miss Lee and Miss Wong – were indignant at the police ban. Despite the risk of a crackdown, they reckoned there’s nothing to fear. ‘They’ve tried to scare us this whole past year, so we might as well come today,’ （我唔撚驚）

‘We do what we want to do, it isn’t up to what this regime says…If we cannot even defend our turf, where else can we gather (to commemorate the Massacre)?’ Miss Wong asked.

Among the crowds, there were children too, including a little girl sitting on her stool. Her mother, Miss Wong, said she knew of the police’s ban but was determined to take her daughter along. She stressed that they were not participating in an assembly, but only commemorating the Massacre on their own. ‘The worst that could happen is getting tear-gassed, we won’t be sent off to jail.’ Miss Wong said. (帶埋女兒抗爭)

國際線手足可以留意下立場嘅英譯專題，外媒比較小咁深入，咁在地將香港人嘅精神報導出嚟。
傳送門：
https://www.thestandnews.com/humans-of-hk/

唔好意思借個位
{失蹤人口}民陣到底死撚咗去邊??
https://lih.kg/2053822
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
